lead_paragraph: "We're thinking that we could move up past 12 million maybe closer to 13 million for 2011," Alan Mulally, chief executive for Ford, told Automotive News on Friday.
snippet: Alan Mulally, Ford's chief executive, said he expected light vehicle sales to grow gradually over the next two years.

headline.main: Ford Chief: Total Industy Sales Could Hit 13 Million in 2011

abstract: Alan Mulally, Ford's chief executive, said he expected light vehicle sales to grow gradually over the next two years.
